title: Office Love Scramble
description:
Story begin with Honma Tarou soon after he get a job, he directly transfer to other workplace. Due excited with first proper job, he arrive at workplace an hour earlier then work hours. At the office, a beautiful ladies checked name list of new worker and said that he will have interview soon. Honma Tarou feel weird getting another interview after already get job but without asking anything more, he follow her to do the interview. What gonna happen to him? A story of office worker that change his life.
